Selkirk_________ 1 - - __________ __________ _________ 4 12 1

Record of the Election for Alcalde for the Year 1824 held at the house of John McFarland, in the Town of San Felipe de Austin Decemr. 20th 1823 Poles closed at 4 Oclock P. M. Sylvenus Castleman duly Elected.
Jas. E. B Austin Clk of the Election [Rubric]
